text:
Wiki Loves the Olympics

Wiki loves THE OLYMPICS

Goal
- Improving the quality and increasing the amount of articles about the Olympic and Paralympic Games
- Focusing on paralympics and sportswomen

How?
- Special categories and prizes for paralympics and sportswomen
- Developed on Meta, for all languages
- 1st edition, August 5 - September 18, 2016

Challenges
- Spreading the contest >> Social networks (\#100WikiDays Facebook Group) / Individual messages on Wikipedia. No spam or banners
- Rules / Checking the work done >> KISS principle
- Shipping prizes >> Vouchers

Bonus contest

Wiki Loves the Olympics (WLO), a photo competition around the Olympic and Paralympic Games organized by the Wikimedia Brazilian Group of Education and Research >> +1000 images uploaded

Results
- 1335 articles | 1199 new articles
- 15 languages
- 45 participants
- 12,366,317 bytes added

64\% about paralympics \& sportswomen


Wiki Loves the Olympics editing contest on Meta-Wikimedia https://meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/Wiki_Loves_the_Olympics
